price: que sea un Mensajero de Dios, que les recite una revelación purificada [de toda falsedad y contradicción],
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
